name: Etherym Guiding Light
text: If this card is in your hand, you can banish this card: add 1 Etherym spell/trap or 1 "Rift Eternal" from your deck to your hand. If this card is summoned, you can add 1 Etherym monster from your deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Etherym Guiding Light
